title: Phone app doesn't want to turn on notifications.
content:
Hello everyone!

Im having an issue where I am trying to turn on notification for Missed calls - Because else if I miss a call I wont be able to see notification from who called me and I need to manually open the phone app and check.

The problem is everytime I try to turn it on it automatic turns off again in the settings and it seems like I can't do anything about it.

I tried to reboot the phone, Cleared cache and Storage multiply times and no luck.
